From Wiktionary, the free dictionary

Catalan

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin observāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): (Central) [up.sərˈba]
  • IPA(key): (Balearic) [op.sərˈva]
  • IPA(key): (Valencia) [op.seɾˈvaɾ]
  • Audio (Barcelona):(file)
  • Rhymes: -a(ɾ)

Verb

[edit]

observar (first-person singular present observo, first-person singular preterite observí, past participle observat); root stress: (Central, Valencia, Balearic) /e/

  1. to observe

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of observar (first conjugation)
infinitive observar
gerund observant
past participle masculine feminine
singular observat observada
plural observats observades
person singular plural
first second third first second third
indicative jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present observo observes observa observem observeu observen
imperfect observava observaves observava observàvem observàveu observaven
future observaré observaràs observarà observarem observareu observaran
preterite observí observares observà observàrem observàreu observaren
conditional observaria observaries observaria observaríem observaríeu observarien
subjunctive jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present observi observis observi observem observeu observin
imperfect observés observessis observés observéssim observéssiu observessin
imperative — tu vostè nosaltres vosaltres
vós 		vostès
affirmative — observa observi observem observeu observin
negative (no) — no observis no observi no observem no observeu no observin

Derived terms

[edit]
  • observatori

Related terms

[edit]
  • observable
  • observació
  • observador
  • observant

Further reading

[edit]
  • “observar”, in Diccionari de la llengua catalana [Dictionary of the Catalan Language] (in Catalan), second edition, Institute of Catalan Studies [Catalan: Institut d'Estudis Catalans], April 2007
  • “observar”, in Gran Diccionari de la Llengua Catalana, Grup Enciclopèdia Catalana, 2025
  • “observar” in Diccionari normatiu valencià, Acadèmia Valenciana de la Llengua.
  • “observar” in Diccionari català-valencià-balear, Antoni Maria Alcover and Francesc de Borja Moll, 1962.

Galician

[edit]

Alternative forms

[edit]
  • auservar
  • ouservar

Etymology

[edit]

From Latin observāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /ˌɔbˈsɛɾbaɾ/ [ˌɔβ̞ˈs̺ɛɾ.β̞aɾ]
  • Rhymes: -ɛɾbaɾ

Verb

[edit]

observar (first-person singular present observo, first-person singular preterite observei, past participle observado)

  1. (transitive) to observe, watch
    Synonyms: examinar, ollar, ver

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of observar
Singular Plural
First-person
(eu) 		Second-person
(ti) 		Third-person
(el / ela / Vde.) 		First-person
(nós) 		Second-person
(vós) 		Third-person
(eles / elas / Vdes.)

Impersonal observar
Personal observar observares observar observarmos observardes observaren
Gerund
observando
Past participle
Masculine observado observados
Feminine observada observadas
Indicative
Present observo observas observa observamos observades observan
Imperfect observaba observabas observaba observabamos observabades observaban
Preterite observei observaches observou observamos observastes observaron
Pluperfect observara observaras observara observaramos observarades observaran
Future observarei observarás observará observaremos observaredes observarán
Conditional observaría observarías observaría observariamos observariades observarían
Subjunctive
Present observe observes observe observemos observedes observen
Imperfect observase observases observase observásemos observásedes observasen
Future observar observares observar observarmos observardes observaren
Imperative
Affirmative observa observe observemos observade observen
Negative (non) non observes non observe non observemos non observedes non observen

Portuguese

[edit]

Alternative forms

[edit]
  • ausservar (Beira, Estremadura, Minho, Trás-os-Montes)
  • osservar (Trás-os-Montes)

Etymology

[edit]

From Latin observāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
 
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /ob.seʁˈva(ʁ)/ [ob.seɦˈva(h)], /o.bi.seʁˈva(ʁ)/ [o.bi.seɦˈva(h)]
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /ob.seʁˈva(ʁ)/ [ob.seɦˈva(h)], /o.bi.seʁˈva(ʁ)/ [o.bi.seɦˈva(h)]
    • (São Paulo) IPA(key): /ob.seɾˈva(ɾ)/, /o.bi.seɾˈva(ɾ)/
    • (Rio de Janeiro) IPA(key): /ob.seʁˈva(ʁ)/ [ob.seʁˈva(χ)], /o.bi.seʁˈva(ʁ)/ [o.bi.seʁˈva(χ)]
    • (Southern Brazil) IPA(key): /ob.seɻˈva(ɻ)/
 
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /ɔ.bsɨɾˈvaɾ/ [ɔ.βsɨɾˈvaɾ]
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /ɔ.bsɨɾˈvaɾ/ [ɔ.βsɨɾˈvaɾ]
    • (Northern Portugal) IPA(key): /ɔ.bsɨɾˈbaɾ/ [ɔ.βsɨɾˈβaɾ]
    • (Southern Portugal) IPA(key): /ɔ.bsɨɾˈva.ɾi/ [ɔ.βsɨɾˈva.ɾi]

  • (Northeast Brazil) IPA(key): /ɔb.sɛɦ.ˈva(h)/
  • Audio (Brazil (Caipira)):(file)
  • Hyphenation: ob‧ser‧var

Verb

[edit]

observar (first-person singular present observo, first-person singular preterite observei, past participle observado)

  1. (transitive) to observe, watch
    Synonyms: examinar, olhar, ver

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of observar (See Appendix:Portuguese verbs)

First-person
(eu) 		Second-person
(tu) 		Third-person

observando

Imperfect observasse observasses observasse observássemos observásseis observassem
Future observar observares observar observarmos observardes observarem
Imperative
Affirmative observa observe observemos observai observem
Negative (não) não observes não observe não observemos não observeis não observem

1Brazilian Portuguese.
2European Portuguese.

Spanish

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin observāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /obseɾˈbaɾ/ [oβ̞.seɾˈβ̞aɾ]
  • Audio (Colombia):(file)
  • Rhymes: -aɾ
  • Syllabification: ob‧ser‧var

Verb

[edit]

observar (first-person singular present observo, first-person singular preterite observé, past participle observado)

  1. (transitive) to observe, to eye

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of observar (See Appendix:Spanish verbs)
infinitive observar
gerund observando
past participle masculine feminine
singular observado observada
plural observados observadas
singular plural
1st person 2nd person 3rd person 1st person 2nd person 3rd person
indicative yo tú
vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ellos/ellas
ustedes
present observo observastú
observásvos 		observa observamos observáis observan

preterite observé observaste observó observamos observasteis observaron
future observaré observarás observará observaremos observaréis observarán
conditional observaría observarías observaría observaríamos observaríais observarían

vos 		él/ella/ello

observávos 		observe observemos observad observen
negative no observes no observe no observemos no observéis no observen

1Mostly obsolete, now mainly used in legal language.
2Argentine and Uruguayan voseo prefers the tú form for the present subjunctive.
